categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Siege of Ramsir was a conflict the Imperial Army was involved in that occurred sometime between the founding of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY and 2 ABY.

The scholar of military history at the Salmagodro Academy, Hu Jibwe, cited a potential recreation of this battle with the Imperial Army's weaponry being limited to parade sabers, when he explained why he felt part of the epic poem Dha Werda Verda was actually figuratively referring to Mandalore the Ultimate and that the re-enactments of various battles via the Zhells were inaccurate interpretations.
